name: Bugborne
description:
Bugborne is a simple game to pick up and play for all the family and you will all soon be wanting to beat each others high scores.

Bugborne's concept is simple, just tap the bees and flies in order to make them tumble down to the floor. The trick to building a high score is to chain bugs together in order to gain a multiplier, in turn, sky rocketing your score.

Make sure to tap bugs before their timer runs out or you will lose a life, when you lose all three it is game over!

**Bees are important to our real world ecosystem and should be treated with care.**
